titles: A preservative against popery. [Parts 1-2.] being some plain directions to unlearned Protestants, how to dispute with Romish priests, the first part / by Will. Sherlock ...
author: Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.
notes: Separate t.p.: The second part of the preservative against popery, shewing how contrary popery is to the true ends of the Christian religion ... / by William Sherlock ... -- London : printed for William Rogers ... 1688.
"Books lately printed for Will. Rogers": p. [91]-[92] at end of first part.
"Books lately printed for W. Rogers": p. [1] at end of second part.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
